version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added proper support for Chords and overlapping by time notes

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Reversed tracks to more or less represent the midi. - Made it so all the notes refer the very first note in the track

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Sorts each note to their corresponding channel. - Makes Groups for each channel. - Sorts the Grouped Tracks. - Colors every Channel Group

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Renamed script to be more compact with naming - Fixed weird case with Channel 0 not being sorted. - Now channels start from 1, instead of 0.
